Name: Cellar
Text: +1 Action. Discard any number of base, then draw that many.

Name: Moat
Text: +2 Cards. When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand/, to be unaffected by it.

Name: Vassal
Text: +2 Money. Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.

Name: Bureaucrat
Text: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory base).

Name: Gardens
Text: Worth one 1 Victory Point per 10 base you have (round down).

Name: Remodel
Text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 more than it.

Name: Bandit
Text: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 base of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

Name: Artisan
Text: Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5. Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
